channel.title: Action collecting the missed calls of the day
channel.description:
Is it possible to make such action which collects missed calls from given day. Something similar to calendar import action.
https://directory.getdrafts.com/a/1If

item.title: Action collecting the missed calls of the day
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
There is nothing in Drafts to access the phone appâ€™s call log. I am not even sure Apple would have something like that in their public API for use by third party developers - it might be a bit of a security concern as that is the sort of thing that other parties could find quite useful to exfiltrate - knowing who you talked to, when, and for how long.

Read full topic
item.source: Action collecting the missed calls of the day
